intro: Melanoseris yunnanensis, commonly known as the Yunnan melanoseris, is a rare flowering plant native to the mountainous regions of Yunnan Province in China. It belongs to the family Melanoseris, which is part of the order Malvales. The plant is characterized by its unique leaf morphology, featuring elliptical leaves with a smooth surface and a dark green coloration. It produces small, pale yellow flowers that bloom during the spring season. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered an endangered species, highlighting the need for conservation efforts.
